ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They did not expect to have a reckoning
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They were those who did not expect a reckoning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: For indeed they did not look forward to any reckoning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They did not expect such a Judgment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed they had no fear of the account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: For verily, they used not to look for a reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they feared not the account,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They indeed hoped not for a reckoning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For lo! they looked not for a reckoning;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: for they never expected to be called to account,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily they were wont not to look for a reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they did not expect any reckoning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For that they used not to fear any account (for their deeds),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For verily, they used not to look for a reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, they did not hope for a Reckoning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For they were not anticipating any reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:27] Indeed they never feared any reckoning, given their rejection of the Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For lo! they looked not) while in the life of the world (for a reckoning) they did not fear the chastisement of the Hereafter nor did they believe in it;
